resources.string: Once complete, click confirm & we will test access, if the command failed, try again.
No Permissions, please allow shortcutter to override DND

Some shortcuts require the ability to modify notification settings, as we cannot request these permissions in the normal fasion, you will need to enable them. 

Click proceed & you will be taken to the relevant screen.

Some tiles require the ability to write system settings, as we cannot request these permissions in the normal fashion, you will need to enable them. 

Click proceed & you will be taken to the relevant screen.
Press back to return once enabled.

You can manually grant Shortcutter access to Settings Secure, allowing more control over the system. 

From your PC go to www.leedroid.co.uk/SettingsSecureGuide & follow the instructions.

LeeDrOiD Tweaks key detected \n Premium features activated
All prices include Tax/VAT* \n\nPurchasing Shortcutter Premium will remove the 50 click notification & enable additional Quick Settings tiles & app features.
Either of the below options will grant you premium access, the choice is yours :)

Please click proceed, select Shortcutter & enable usage access.

Failed to launch data usage information
Click Here for A guide to adding Quick Setting Tiles.\n\nOnce you have enabled your chosen tiles in the categories below, you need to add them to your pull-down in the system quick settings editor.
How To Add QS Tiles - Guide
1. Go to the Shortcutter \"Pull-Down\" tab & make your QS Tile selections.

2. Pull down your status bar & hit the edit button as seen below, this is usually a pen icon. 

 Samsung users hit the 3 dot menu & select rearrange.

 Your Shortcutter tiles will show in the bottom view.

3. In the Edit View you will find 2/3 containers, you will see your new Shortcutter tiles in the bottom container. \n\nTo add them, simply long press & drag your chosen tiles up to the top (Active) container & exit the Edit View.

IMPORTANT NOTE: 

 Due to a bug in Android N, you may struggle to add tiles, this can be worked around by doing the following. 

Remove any tiles you do not want in the "Pull-Down" tab & take your new tiles from the TOP of the available tiles container. 

Unfortunately this is not something I can fix as it has nothing to do with the app.

This feature is only available in the Premium version of Shortcutter. 

Please click GO PREMIUM now to enable the following features: 

 • Additional Custom Tiles 
 • Additional Custom URL Tiles 
 • Screen Recording & Capture 
 • Additional in-app configuration options 
 • & Remove the 50 tile click notification

Thats 50 Shortcutter clicks! 

Have you considered showing your support & going Premium? 

This notification will show every 50 tile clicks in the Free version.
Write System Settings permission required - Toggle to enable
Usage Access permissions required - Toggle to enable
Do Not Distrurb access required - Toggle to enable

Allows shortcutter to perform the following accessibility actions 

• Toggle Split Screen 
• Toggle Recent Apps 
• Show Power Menu 
• Expand Notifications & Quick Settings 
• Detect Activities - Required for Screen Filter & Screen Corners, these services will be stopped when apps are being installed & permissions are being granted.
Required to use the \"Lock Screen\" Quick Settings Tile

Shortcutter requires Accessibility access to toggle 

• Recent Apps 
• Power Menu 
• Split Screen 
• Detect Activities 
 - Required for Screen Filter & Screen Corners, these services will be stopped when apps are being installed & permissions are being granted. 

Click proceed, go to Shortcutter & enable the service.
Toggle Split Screen / Multi Window Mode

Shortcutter requires Admin privileges to:

 •Lock your device screen 

Please press proceed & enable Admin rights to use this Shortcut.
Please select a time in hh:mm:ss
Routes all audio through your device earpiece

Several Shortcutter services require the Draw System Overlay permission to run, these include:
 
• Sidebar/Floating Toolbox 
• Screen Filter/Night Mode 
• Rounded Corners 
• Network Mode Dialogs 

Please click proceed & grant the required permission.
A Sidebar opened by a swipe of the trigger, or a Floating ToolBox with a floating icon.
Change Number Of Tiles In Collapsed View
Customise the number of QS tiles shown in the collapsed Pull-Down. \nThis MOD is manufacturer dependent.
Choose between the Swipe Out Sidebar or Floating Toolbox.
Are you sure you want to reset all colour preferences?
A screen filter to reduce eye strain at night (Night Mode)
Uses an overlay to give the illusion of rounded screen corners
Shortcutter offers several different options to access an array of shortcuts, settings & services in an instant.

Via your Quick Settings Pull-Down 
 
• Add up to 94 additional Quick Settings Tiles! 
• Access shortcuts, toggles, tools & services from your pull-down panel.

The Shortcutter Sidebar/Floating Toolbox 
 
• Always on top and accessible. 
• Choose between a SideBar or a Floating Toolbox. 
• Open with a swipe or touch of the trigger. 
• Fully customisable layout, position & design. 
• Up to 105 different shortcuts, toggles, tools & services!

Launcher Shortcuts 
 
• Expose toggles your app drawer & home screen, enabling mapping to HTC Edge Sense, Second Displays, Tasker & much more! 
• Add up to 32 home screen shortcuts.

Launcher Shortcuts 

• Expose toggles your app drawer, enabling mapping to HTC Edge Sense, Second Displays, Tasker & much more! 
• Add up to 85 dynamic home screen shortcuts!.
\nPlease pay attention to the How To Add Tiles Guide in tab 2.
Produces a screenshot using the system screencap binary
Enable/Disable the fancy reflow Pull-Down animation (Not compatible with all devices)
Launches a popup with current weather information
Displays current location, with options to view in maps or share

This overlay requires Accessibility access to: 

 • Detect secure activities. 

If a secure activity is detected, this overlay will automatically stop. 

Click proceed, go to Shortcutter & enable the service.
Launches Settings \> Location/n(if no settings secure access)
Provides an always on Nightlight & clock display, plus a button to switch to Desk Clock Mode
Create an additional \"Sidebar Expander\" icon to open/close the Sidebar or ToolBox from your home screen or other apps.
Usage: Brightness, Font Scale, Haptic Feedback & Display Timeout
Usage: Floating Sidebar/ToolBox, Screen Filter & Rounded Corners
Usage: Recent Apps, Power Menu, Split Screen, Expand Notifications & Quick Settings, Screen Filter & Rounded Corners

This toggle requires the ability to check network state.

 In order to do this the app needs the Phone permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This service requires the ability to access external storage.

 In order to do this the app needs the Read/Write Storage permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This toggle requires the ability to access the camera (Flash).

 In order to do this the app needs the Camera permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This toggle requires the ability to access your Sync settings.

 In order to do this the app needs the Read/Write Sync permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This toggle requires the ability to access your Location.

 In order to do this the app needs the Location permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.
Don\'t forget to leave review in the Play Store!\n\nAny additional issues or feedback, please drop me an email :)
Create additional icons to access these toggle\'s from your home screen or app drawer.\n\nThis also enables mapping toggles to other app\'s such as HTC Edge Sense, Second Displays & Tasker.
Dim background & collapse when touched outside or button pressed.
Toggle the devices notification LED on/off\n(Manufacturer dependent)
Quick Settings tiles to toggle system settings
Tiles that provide & link to useful system information
Assign Applications, Activities, Shortcuts & Web Links.\nEnable the tiles here, then click the tile to assign your chosen app, activity or shortcut.
Assign Applications, Activities, Shortcuts, Web Links & Shell Commands.\nEnable the tiles here, then click the tile to assign your chosen app, activity or shortcut.
Assign Applications, Activities, Shortcuts & Web Links.
Assign Applications, Activities, Shortcuts, Web Links & Shell Commands.
Customise the behaviour of the Sidebar/Toolbox & its trigger.
These permissions will be requested when enabling services that require them, they do not need to be explicitly granted.
Run the app in the English Language

Your device requires applications to be granted auto start permissions, Shortcutter background services will be killed if this is not enabled.\n\nPlease click Proceed & enable auto start for Shortcutter.

Shortcutter contains several background services, none of these services are power hungry or intensive, however in some instances, Android may kill these services when the device goes into deep sleep.

 To negate this issue I would recommend disabling Battery Optimisation for Shortcutter via Settings > Power.

I hope you enjoy the app!

As you are using a Samsung device, you may experience tiles becoming unresponsive after being dormant.\nTo rectify this issue, please exclude Shortcutter from battery optimisations in your device settings.
Got a problem or feature request\? \n Mail me first :)

Your device appears to be rooted!\n\n\Would you like to enable all root features now?

Change Log: 

v5.8.0: 
• NEW Shortcutter simple floating calculator. 
• Bug Fixes. 

v5.7.9: 
• Save & restore quick reminders after reboot. 
• Clean-up sidebar left trigger. 
• Force refresh all tiles when changing stateless tile state. 
• Set all information tiles to Active state. 
• Translation updates. 
• Adjust custom app icon tile scaling (no cropping). 
• SideBar vertical position now independent of trigger. 
• Add warning when toggling experimental features. 
• Bug Fixes. 

v5.7.8: 
• Fix stateless tint toggle icon. 
• Fix crash when setting filter auto start/stop with 12 hour time format. 
• Fix crash in quick reminder on some devices. 
• Make random colour in Quick Reminder optional. 

v5.7.7: 
• Fix QS Tile states in some Active Tiles. 
• Translation updates. 
• Stateless Tiles - Choose default active/inactive colour state. 
• Night Light/Desk Clock - move to avoid screen burn. 
• Improve quick reminders: 
• - Randomise highlight colours. 
• - Fix existing reminders being replaced. 
• - Fix editing reminders when multiple reminders exist. 

v5.7.6: 
• Improve "How It Works" screens. 
• Re-design sidebar trigger (Cleaner scaling). 
• Improve Screen Filter auto start/stop. 
• Additional launcher shortcuts. 
• Fix buttons in time picker dialog. 
• Fix widget crash on Android 6 & 7. 
• UI tweaks. 

v5.7.3: 
• NEW Shortcutter Widget & configuration activity - BETA. 
• Install shortcut & widget item selection now gets tile title instead of label. 
• Translation updates. 
• Add optional exposed launcher icons for Quick Reminder, Quick Calendar & Clipboard Editor. 
• Fix using enter button for new line in quick reminder. 

v5.7.0: 
• Restart Screen Filter & Round Corners when toggling options. 
• Enable voice input & rearrange buttons in quick reminder. 
• Add AirPlane Mode tile (ROOT Only). 
• Add Storage Usage Tile (Available internal memory). 
• Fix Crash in RestartServices. 
• Performance enhancements. 

v5.6.9: 
• Fix Quick Calendar Icon. 
• Update translations. 
• Re-arrange SideBar designer options. 
• Welcome screen updates. 
• Fix overlay blocking perms on initial setup. 

v5.6.6 - v5.6.8: 
• New Service/Toggle: Quick Calendar. 
• Only show "Suspending overlays" 3 times. 
• Update Translations. 
• Add additional logic to toggles for root users. 
• Improved Oreo dynamic & pinned shortcut refresh logic. 
• Do not show toast in dynamic shortcuts. 
• Add custom colour option to dynamic shortcuts. 

v5.6.5: 
• Fix crash in restart services. 
• Apply state icon tint to dynamic shortcuts. 
• Remove redundant dynamic shortcuts. 
• Improve brightness preset icon. 
• Fix shortcut crash on Android 7.1. 
• Add 10 custom tiles to launcher shortcuts selection (Oreo +) 
‣ assign activities, web links, apps & shell commands. 

v5.6.4: 
• Fix screen filter incorrectly activating after Screenshot. 
• Fix advanced power menu exposed icon (Root). 
• New Shortcuts for API 25 (Android 7.1) and above! 
• - All in app toggles available. 
• Improved toggle toast message when using shortcuts. 
• Fix accessibility toggle auto re-enabling when disabled. 

v5.5.8 - v5.6.3: 
• Add Backup/Restore to file. 
• Add Edit button to quick reminders. 
• Check if notifications enabled for Shortcutter where required. 
• If settings secure enabled - attempt auto re-enable Accessibility instead of showing dialog. 
• Make sidebar icon animations optional (Icon Designer). 
• Improve suspending overlays during secure activities. 
• Welcome screen updates. 
• Icon designer updates. 
• Bug fixes. 

v5.5.7: 
• Do not remove tiles that require settings secure access. 
• Translation Updates. 
• Bug Fixes. 

v5.5.4 - v5.5.6: 
• Fix bug when setting per app immersive mode. 
• Translation updates. 
• Enable drag - drop rearrange in APM. 
• Accessibility auto re-enable if app has Settings Secure or ROOT access. 
• Add Invert Colours tile (Settings Secure Required) 

v5.4.8 - V5.5.3: 
• Correct tab highlights when opening to specific tabs. 
• Header icon size corrections. 
• Add +/- buttons to Icon Designer seek bars. 
• All Seek bar +/- buttons now implement long click repeat. 
• Fix random color option. 
• Fix custom tiles not refreshing when changed. 
• Add ability to select Screen Timeout values. 
• Improve multi toggle methods. 
• Make QuickReminder notification icon optional. 
• Fix custom tile 1 not being removed. 
• Translation Updates. 
• Add Play Store My Apps tile. 
• Root screen shot method improved. 
• Fix memory leak. 

v5.4.6 - v5.4.7: 
• Translation Updates. 
• New SideBar/ToolBox designer with preview. 
• Improve sizing logic. 
• SideBar/ToolBox style application fixes. 

v5.4.5: 
• Major sidebar speed improvements. 
• Fix colours in nightlight/desk clock. 
• App draw search now uses starts with. 
• Remove screenshot from APM if non premium. 
• Update welcome screen shots. 

v5.4.4: 
• Fix toggle toast colours. 
• Update Chinese, Polish & German translations. 

v5.3.9 Beta - v5.4.3: 
• SideBar header icons and text now scaled with contents. 
• Major code rewrite and optimisation in SideBar grid items. 
• Remove requirement to reload SideBar grid array when expanding. 
• Clipboard Editor active/inactive state (contains text). 

v5.2.5 Beta - V5.3.8: 
• Show toast message when running overlays without accessibility. 
• Fix premium only icons. 
• Show warning when user has an excessive number of tiles enabled. 
• Add option to randomise Icon & Label colours. 
• Accessibility improvements (Suspend services). 
• Android 6 bug fixes. 
• Add SideBar Icon spacing options. 
• Improve SideBar icon spacing & sizing logic. 
• Request call permissions when assigning contact shortcut. 
† SideBar performance enhancements and layout adjustments. 
• Add new SideBar icon designer. 
• Fix Per App Immersive selections not always applying first time. 
• Do not reset immersive Per App selections when changing mode. 
• Polish & Turkish translation updates. 
• Fix reminder icon colour. 
• Fix Data Speed total usage - now shows total usage since last boot. 
• Remove Dice tile animation on Oreo as no longer supported. 

v5.2.0 Beta - V5.2.4: 
• Enable Per App Immersive Mode selection. 
• Layout & translation corrections. 
• Make trigger invisible when hiding, do not remove. 
• Add Data Speed service & Tiles. 
• Fix crash in screen record. 
• Add request enable location in Weather & My Location. 
• Add Share & refresh buttons to Weather. 
• Add Notification Log Tiles. 
• Add Quick Reminder feature & tiles. 
• Apply accent color to notifications. 
• Fix launching app launcher from desktop. 
• Fix crash on some devices when enabling sidebar. 

V5.1.9: 
• Fix critical error in Weather Service when Google API Server unavailable. 
• Add New Map to My Location view. 
• Add ClipBoard Editor & Tiles. 
• Add Per App Immersive Mode & app selector (Premium). 
• App & Activity selection now uses Activity icon where available. 
• Add App Launcher/Folder & Quick tiles (Premium). 
• Bug fixes. 
• Translation updates. 

V5.1.4: 
• Roll back activity loading method. 
• Add Stopwatch & Tiles. 
• Fix window background flicker on some activities. 
• Add device details to feedback email. 
• Enable exposing activity launcher. 
• Fix shell command case. 
• Countdown status bar icon shows remaining time hh/mm or mm/ss. 
• Fix Countdown calculation. 
• Add force audio to speakers tile (Phone quality only) - BETA. 
• Bug Fixes. 

V5.1.3: 
• Add search to App & Activity Picker's 
• Activity Picker - load more activities 
• Improve Sidebar drag & drop. 
• Hide trigger with StatusBar off as default. 
• Improve Countdown Tile & add to SideBar options. 
• Fix crash in screen record when MediaRecorder is not available. 

V5.1.2: 
• Screen record & capture now creates additional requests if denied. 
• Screen record & capture bug fixes. 
• Add option to hide SideBar/Toolbox trigger with status bar (i.e when in full screen video) 
• Adjust touch zones & improve APM, Weather & My Location. 
• Add option to change values toggled in Orientation tile. 

V5.1.1: 
• Reorganise Settings tab. 
• Add Bonus Features section to Home tab. 
• Card layout corrections. 
• Enable (ROOT) One Handed Mode in SideBar. 
• Dialog corrections. 
• NFC toggle use ROOT if available. 
• Fix SideBar PIP (ROOT) Tile. 
• Floating Toolbox trigger now scalable. 

V5.1.0: 
• In app dialogue styling. 
• Bug fixes. 
• Fix text being cut off in SideBar. 
• Data Usage Tile option - show total usage. 
• Data Usage Tile now shows in MB if less than 1GB used. 

V5.0.7 - 5.0.9 - Beta: 
• Add action confirmation to APM (Optional) 
• New Seek Dialogs 
• Fix crash when trimming custom app icon. 
• Fix crash in Weather service/provider. 
• Fix crash in Screen Recorder when video profile not available on device. 
• Bonus feature - hide Oreo running in background notification. 

V5.0.6: 
• Dim Background now collapses SideBar/Toolbox on key press. 
• Dim Background enabled as default. 
• Improve APM dimensions. 
• Show change log when app updated. 

V5.0.5: 
• Fix layout bug in main app when theme set. 
• Fix crash in icon back selection. 
• Fix crash in screen recorder. 
• Fix SideBar/Toolbox crash when bad icon resource used. 

V5.0.0 - V5.0.4: 
• Screenshot countdown moved to notification. 
• Layout fidelity fix-ups. 
• Dialog colour corrections. 
• Full application re-design. 
• Dark / Light Themes. 
• New Card Layout. 
• New dialogues. 
• New crash catcher with feedback button. 
• Improve colour picker. 
• Increase pull-down custom icon count.
Hide Oreo running in background notification

To block notifications we need to enable a Notification Listener.

This listener will only listen for notifications from the android system, any notification containing "running in the background" will be removed.

 Please click proceed & enable Shortcutters Notification Blocker.

Trigger becomes invisible when the status bar is hidden. i.e when in full screen video
Force audio to speakerphone (BETA - uses call stream quality)

Adds a pinned notification reminder to your pull-down
Shows a notification with up/down data speed
Show total data usage since last boot.
Contact me directly, I aim to reply within 7 days

These services use system overlays, they may interfere with some applications and permissions screens.\n\nThey are in no way malicious, I have done all i can to auto disable them when secure activities are present.
Change the look of the sidebar & its icons.
Shows available internal storage (Excludes system reserved)
Highlight tiles that have no active/inactive colour state as active (A reboot may be required).
